name: mu-scheduler
description: A web application designed to streamline the course registration process at Miami University - Oxford.
author: Hilarious Atlantic

scripts.database: brew services restart postgresql && createuser schedule_buddy --createdb --superuser
scripts.build-server: cd server/ && go get && cd ../ && go build -o start-server server/*.go
scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-client
scripts.setup: npm run setup-server && npm run setup-client
